name: infra-sample-api-node
description: ACM@UIUC Infra - Sample AWS Lambda in Node
author: ACM@UIUC

scripts.build:lambda: rm -rf dist/ && yarn build && esbuild ./build/* --bundle --minify --platform=node --target=node20 --outdir=dist/ && rm -rf build/ && cp package.json dist/ && yarn lockfile-manage
scripts.lockfile-manage: synp --source-file yarn.lock && cp package-lock.json dist/ && rm package-lock.json
